questions.question: There ___ a book on the table.
A person who teaches is a ___.
We eat with a knife and ___.
The animal that says 'meow' is a ___.
The capital of the UK is ___.

questions.text: My name is Tom. I am 10 years old. I live in a small house with my family. I have one brother and one sister. My brother is 12 and my sister is 8. We have a dog. His name is Max.
questions.question: How old is Tom?

questions.question: What pet does the family have?

questions.text: My name is Tom. I am 10 years old. I live in a small house with my family. I have one brother and one sister. My brother is 12 and my sister is 8. We have a dog. His name is Max.
questions.question: How old is Tom's sister?

questions.text: Anna goes to school at 8 o'clock. She has lunch at 12. After school, she plays with her friends. She comes home at 5 o'clock. She does homework and watches TV.
questions.question: What time does Anna go to school?

questions.text: Anna goes to school at 8 o'clock. She has lunch at 12. After school, she plays with her friends. She comes home at 5 o'clock. She does homework and watches TV.
questions.question: What does Anna do after school?

questions.question: When does Anna come home?

questions.text: I like fruit. My favorite fruit is apple. Apples are red and sweet. I eat an apple every day. Bananas are good too, but I like apples more.
questions.question: What is the person's favorite fruit?

questions.text: I like fruit. My favorite fruit is apple. Apples are red and sweet. I eat an apple every day. Bananas are good too, but I like apples more.
questions.question: What color are apples?

questions.scenario: At a cafe: 'Hello! Can I have a coffee, please?' - 'Of course. Anything else?'
questions.question: Where is this conversation?

questions.scenario: At a cafe: 'Hello! Can I have a coffee, please?' - 'Of course. Anything else?'
questions.question: What does the person want?

questions.scenario: Meeting someone: 'Hi! My name is John. Nice to meet you.' - 'Nice to meet you too. I'm Sarah.'
questions.question: What is the man's name?

questions.scenario: At a shop: 'How much is this?' - 'It's 5 dollars.'
questions.question: What does the person ask about?

questions.scenario: On the phone: 'Hello?' - 'Hi! It's Mom. Are you at home?'
questions.question: Who is calling?

questions.scenario: In class: 'Can I borrow your pen?' - 'Sure, here you are.'
questions.question: What does the person want to borrow?

questions.scenario: Weather: 'What's the weather like?' - 'It's sunny and warm.'
questions.question: How is the weather?

questions.scenario: Time: 'What time is it?' - 'It's half past three.'
questions.question: What time is it?
